docs.text: Opservatory A small deployable tool for opserving local fleet of machines and reserving them for staging/testing. Deploy Use this docker compose to deploy the system: version: "3.3" services: opservatory: image: <put an actual deckerhub image here> ports: - "80:5000" volumes: - ./volumes:/app/opservatory/volumes docker-compose up --build -d Update docker-compose pull docker-compose up --build -d
docs.title: Opservatory
